xml:
Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 4 - Warning: Do not drink alcohol

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Metronidazole 200mg/5ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(A A H Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 271811000001101
